name: Dream Doggie
description:
Created for CA Franco Jam 2022 (Prompt: Animal Rescue). 

A game about adopting dogs, featuring hand drawn representations of some real life doggos from Holbrook Animal Rescue.

Neil Doyle - Sound Design, Music, Audio Programming

CorinGetorix - Writing

Guantes188 - Game Design, Writing

Alex - Writing, Production

Aik.wk - Programming

Denes - Programming

Vicky - Art

Morty - Art

Ovidiu - Tech Art

Barney, Amber, Clare - Voice Talent

Audio Engine: FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.
